shortDescription: Unspecified vulnerability in Adobe ColdFusion 9.0, 9.0.1, 9.0.2, and 10 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via unknown vectors.
vulnerabilityName: Adobe ColdFusion 9.0, 9.0.1, 9.0.2, and 10 Remote File Read
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
